post_text:
Hello Legacy families,

Tomorrow, will be the first in-person day of school for Group B. Group B scholars are students who come into the building on Thursdays and Fridays. Our doors open for breakfast @ 7:45 am. Instruction starts promptly @ 8:00 am.

For safety purposes, every scholar will have their temperature checked prior to entering the building and scholars are required to wear a mask while in the building.

Parents, if you need to enter the building for any reason please call the office at (313) 368-2215 to schedule an appointment.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Have a great evening!

post_text:
We miss you and are so excited to welcome you back to school this fall! We are planning for a school year of learning together in an in-person classroom environment. However, we realize things can change between now and the first day of school. Take a moment to watch this video to hear more about how we’re preparing for the 2020-21 school year. We created detailed plans around four learning scenarios. These plans are in-line with our state's department of education plan, which outlines required and recommended safety protocols for the 2020-21 school year based on the status of coronavirus in our community.
For the most up to date information on back to school plan, please visit: https://www.nhaschools.com/en/COVID-19

All students will be provided personal learning devices!

While we may not know exactly what the next school year holds—whether we’re back in school, remote, or a combination of both—we have a plan in place and the technology to support it. All of our students will be provided personal learning devices and will be able to attend online classes.

post_text:
Food distribution at Legacy Charter Academy will unfortunately be suspended, effective March 30. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. Please know, we are committed to providing alternatives to ensure students maintain a healthy and nutritious diet, even when they are away from our building. Families may receive meals at another nearby NHA location (if meals are still available). The nearest NHA schools are:

Hamtramck Academy, 11420 Conant St, Hamtramck, MI 48212.

Regent Park Scholars Charter Academy, 15865 Seven Mile E, Detroit, MI 48205.

Families may pick up meals from those schools between 9 a.m. - 2 p.m., Monday through Friday, while supplies last. Please know, we will provide food for weekend days at that time.

post_text: The Chronic Absenteeism Prevention Team has taken a close look at Legacy’s attendance. We found that scholars are more likely to be absent on Fridays than any other day of the week. Currently our daily average attendance for Mondays- Thursdays is 94.51% versus 91% for Fridays. Our GOAL is to bridge that gap and increase our Friday attendance. To help bridge the gap we have put in place our Attendance Feature Film. K-2 scholars must attend school on all Mondays and Fridays leading up to the Attendance Feature Film event. The dates are as follows: 10/18, 10/21, 10/25, 10/28 and 11/1. Scholars will not be admitted into the event if they are absent on any of the beforementioned dates. If you have any questions regarding the specifics of the Attendance Feature Film event please contact Mr. Shipp or Mr. Little by calling the main office at (313)368-2215.
text: The Chronic Absenteeism Prevention Team has taken a close look at Legacy’s attendance. We found that scholars are more likely to be absent on Fridays than any other day of the week. Currently our daily average attendance for Mondays- Thursdays is 94.51% versus 91% for Fridays. Our GOAL is to bridge that gap and increase our Friday attendance. To help bridge the gap we have put in place our Attendance Feature Film. K-2 scholars must attend school on all Mondays and Fridays leading up to the Attendance Feature Film event. The dates are as follows: 10/18, 10/21, 10/25, 10/28 and 11/1. Scholars will not be admitted into the event if they are absent on any of the beforementioned dates. If you have any questions regarding the specifics of the Attendance Feature Film event please contact Mr. Shipp or Mr. Little by calling the main office at (313)368-2215.

Legacy Family,
Due to inclement weather and the safety of our scholars and families, Legacy will be closed Friday, February 1st.

Enjoy your evening.
